Who is Vannempalli Iswarya?

Let me introduce myself..

As a Final-Year B.Tech Student of QIS College of Engineering in Ongole. I am on the journey to transform my enthusiasm for technology into a career in Web-Development.

Holding a solid CGPA of 8.8, I've demonstrated my ability to excel academically while diving deep into the world of computer science. I fell in love with programming and I am fluent in classics like C++, Javascript and Go.

Through my studies, I've gained a solid understanding of web development concepts, and have dedicated a lot of time to apply these concepts to real-world scenarios and applications.

My strengths lie in intellectual curiosity and effective problem solving. I am an active learner, a self-motivator and a fast-grasper. Apart from coding, some other activities that I love to do!

  • -> helping friends in Tech
  • -> Listening songs
  • -> gardening

My projects

Some Things I Built

I like to stay busy and always have a project in the works. Take a look at some of the applications I've have built

01

LOST AND FOUND

A simple, student-friendly web portal to report and find lost items within a college campus. Many students lose personal items like ID cards, pens, water bottles, and accessories inside the college campus. This web portal is a simple solution:
📢 Students can report lost or found items
👀 Others can view and search the items
🤝 Helps reunite students with their belongings

  • Python
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Flask
  • SQLite
  • Github →

02

Game Hub

GameHub is a versatile Android-integrated gaming platform that bundles multiple offline games into one sleek website.Games like... 🪨Rock Paper Scissors 🧠 General Knowledge Quiz 🔤 Hangman ❌⭕ Tic Tac Toe 🔀 Anagram Solver 🧠 Snake & ladder User-Friendly Interface Navigate easily with clear prompts and instructions. Challenge yourself or friends again and again!
